original_title: ドMJ〇お散歩「えっ、普通って精子飲まないんですか・・・？」～初体験は40歳のおじさん。何も知らずにいろんなことを教えこまれていた性格よし子女子校生～
overview: This time I met a girl whose first experience (first boyfriend) was a 40-year-old uncle who met in a game chat. She has her twinkling eyes, her silky hair, and her good personality that oozes when she speaks. She seems to be able to forgive anything because she is full of gaps in the atmosphere. When I thought about it, I accidentally swallowed my uncle's dirty sperm. If you ask her often, it seems that she was always swallowing as she was told by her first boyfriend. She also loves deep throating and choking. She thought it was normal for her. This is imprinting. That's why I went on a date with a high school girl who was super masochistic and had a good personality, and I also loved SEX! It's a proof of Do M-chan that it feels good while saying "No, stop, stop" like a habit. In order to meet such a girl, I think I will start a game with chat.
title: Lewd Masochist Schoolgirl Takes A Stroll. “Hey, Don’t You Usually Swallow Cum?” First Experiences With A 40 Year Old Guy. Friendly Schoolgirl Gets A Big Lesson Without Realizing It.
